summary: A romantic two-day escape in Barcelona, highlighting the Liceu Opera and Gaudi's architectural wonders alongside vibrant local cuisine.

days.title: Day 1: Cultural Immersion & Evening Performance
activities: 08:30 - Breakfast at **La Cova del Drac** (La Rambla), known for traditional Catalan dishes like crema catalana
10:00 - Guided visit to **Sagrada Família** (including crypt and exterior views; reservation required)
12:30 - Lunch at **El Xamà** (Jardí Botànic), modern Barcelona dining with botanical garden views
15:00 - Art exploration at **MNAC** (Museu Nacional d'Art de Catalunya) showcasing Catalan art history
18:00 - Sunset stroll along **Passeig de Gràcia** to admire Gaudí's Casa Amatller and Casa Lleó Morera
19:30 - **Grand Tier Performance** at Gran Teatre del Liceu (book剧目
for an evening opera with Catalan heritage)

days.title: Day 2: Modern Architecture & Flamenco
activities: 09:00 - Panoramic visit to **Park Güell** (include early access option to avoid crowds) with guide
12:00 - Lunch at **Ca l'Isidre** (Barri Gòtic) for patés and vermouth culture
14:30 - Visit **Casa Batlló** (include terrrace access for rooftop photography)
16:30 - Art & Gaudí hybrid at **La Pedrera** (Casa Milà) urban gardens and roof terrace
19:00 - Sunset at **Mirador del Alcalde** (Barceloneta) with Mediterranean views
21:30 - Romantic **flamenco dinner show** at **Corral de la Morería** (pre-book private table)
